home.title: Website Developer
home.intro: Hi! I'm Manika Singla, a creative and detail-oriented Full Stack Web Developer who brings ideas to life through stunning, functional websites. I specialize in both front-end elegance and back-end logic, ensuring seamless digital experiences.

about.title: ABOUT
about.intro: Hi, I am Manika Singla! I am a Full Stack Web Developer passionate about creating modern, responsive, and user-friendly websites and applications. I specialize in crafting clean, efficient, and visually appealing digital experiences using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, MongoDB, MySQL, and more.

sections.heading: My Web Development Journey
sections.text: My journey into web development began with a deep curiosity about how websites function. Over time, this curiosity turned into a passion for building interactive user interfaces, improving web experiences, and staying updated with the latest industry trends. This passion eventually led me to explore backend technologies and become a full stack developer.

sections.heading: What I Do Best
list: Responsive Web Design - Ensuring seamless experiences across all devices.
Interactive & Dynamic Web Experiences - Enhancing websites using JavaScript.
Backend Development - Building robust server-side logic using Node.js and databases.
Performance Optimization - Writing efficient, maintainable code.
Web Accessibility - Building websites that are inclusive and user-friendly.

sections.heading: Expanding My Knowledge
sections.text: As a full stack developer, I continuously seek to strengthen my skills across both frontend and backend technologies. I'm constantly exploring new frameworks, tools, and best practices to deliver scalable, high-performing web applications.

sections.heading: My Passion and Goals
sections.text: I thrive on continuous learning, problem-solving, and building intuitive digital experiences. My goal is to develop impactful, high-performing, accessible, and visually stunning web applications while consistently pushing my skills to new heights.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Engineering
education.institution: Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology, Patiala
education.description: Currently in 4th Semester, learning Web Development, Data Structures, DBMS, and Artificial Intelligence.
Stream: Non-Medical (Physics, Chemistry, Math) | CBSE Board

projects.title: PROJECTS
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I have worked on:

items.title: Netflix Clone
items.description: A responsive Netflix landing page clone using modern layout and grid.

items.title: Spotify Clone
items.description: A music app clone with UI components and basic player functionality.

items.title: Weather App
items.description: A web app that fetches real-time weather data using OpenWeatherMap API.
